bug.author: rkooo567
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
When I run the placement group stress test, I could reliably (not always) reproduce the error. Here is an error. After this error, the test just hanged. <denchmark-code>2020-10-08 08:49:11,202 WARNING worker.py:1090 -- The actor or task with ID 7ddc2389db0c1b12ffffffff01000000 is pending and cannot currently be scheduled. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): Run ci/regression_test/stress_test/placement_group_test/test_placement_group.py
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.
